content: SFH SD Z Self-drilling wood trim screws Single wood screw (zinc-plated) for fastening wood trim and base to studs ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Screws driven in quickly due to optimized drill point geometry Low contact pressure – for more comfortable, less tiring screwdriving Precisely matched to Hilti drivers and bits – helping to achieve high-quality fastenings every time All Hilti drill-point screws meet or exceed ASTM C 954 performance requirements Applications Fastening wood trim and base to studs (20-14 ga) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Countersunk Screw drive/recess type: Square Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Countersunk | Screw drive/recess type | Square | Collated | No | Length | 2-1/4 in | Product Class | Standard | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 20 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 86236 - Trim head screw zinc 6 x 2-1/4 SFH - Package Size 3000 pc
